jobDescription: Robert Half Technology is seeking a Data Analyst with Web Scraping experience. This is a short -term project that can potentially be completed remotely. Our client is looking to develop a reporting tool that aggregates data from publicly accessible websites into a reporting file. This project entails web scraping of large amounts of data from multiple websites into a singular CSV or Excel file. If you have experience performing a similar web scraping project, please apply to this posting directly.  For immediately consideration, please contact Kevin Ngo at kevin.ngo@rht.com
